MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Castle Douglas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm due to a damaged wall bracket outside 50 Carlingwark Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:26pm on Thursday, 11 March 2021
